PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02052018-03-06TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Interpretation and Standards 108 and 108.1)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (INTERPRETATION AND STANDARDS 108 AND 108.1) in order to enhance safety for Canadian road users by introducing specific requirements regarding the installation, performance and switching of lighting systems, thus providing improved conspicuity for three-wheeled vehicles and motor-tricycles.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0043 Publication Date: 2018-03-21
AttachmentsAttachment
